notebookScrollRestoration.title: Notebook Scroll Restoration
notebookScrollRestoration.description: Enable adaptive scroll restoration for notebooks (cell-based tracking with stabilization)

markdownScrollRestoration.title: Markdown/Text Scroll Restoration
markdownScrollRestoration.description: Enable adaptive scroll restoration for markdown and text files (guard mode with interference detection)

notebookTimeout.title: Notebook Stabilization Timeout (milliseconds)
notebookTimeout.description: Maximum duration to wait for notebook cell rendering and content stabilization. Increase for large notebooks with many cells.

markdownTimeout.title: Markdown/Text Stabilization Timeout (milliseconds)
markdownTimeout.description: Maximum duration to monitor for scroll position drift in markdown and text files. Increase if images load slowly.
